channel.title: Comments on: Hot and sweaty day

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Thanks to all those who helped us moved, we're now fully inpacked and settled and enjoyed the lovely weather this last week.</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks to all those who helped us moved, we’re now fully inpacked and settled and enjoyed the lovely weather this last week.

item.title: By: Mum

item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GM4/$FILE/embarassed.gif"</a>> Many thanks for all the help - mich appreciated!!</p>
